text: @maddow Oh my gosh, they can't BELIEVE THAT THE PRESIDENT IS GOING TO HAVE A RALLY! Even though they did all this stuff to our country (Coronavirus, Riots) it didn't seem to stop them. They are so in PANIC MODE! What else can they think of NEXT?  Time to ask the money man SOROS!
